Attributes.description: Environmental contamination, regulatory requirements, site investigation, migration of contaminants, containment systems, site remediation technologies, design considerations related to soil-contaminant interactions, hydrogeology, geochemistry and types of contaminants. Design and performance case histories.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of CIVL 210, CIVL 315, CIVL 316.
